column4: Hey, I just recently burnt a 64bit Ubuntu 8.10 Disc, anyway, I have used the ISO before but this time I get "Buffer I/O Error on device sr0 logical error [*Some number*]" or something along the lines of that, I tried a disc verify, but it gets the same error trying to load it. Only thing different since last boot of ubuntu is a bios update afaicr.
try making a live cd of the latest version of ubuntu
